CREATE TABLE osontop.sessions ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(), user_id UUID not null, device_id UUID not null, timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP );
CREATE TABLE osontop.devices ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(), device_id TEXT not null, os_version TEXT, os TEXT, model TEXT, brand TEXT, device_type TEXT, fcm_token TEXT, deleted boolean, created_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, last_modified_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP );
